My favorite!"\nTaking a big bite, she exclaimed, "This is the best I\'ve ever tasted!"\nAfter finishing the last bite, Emily groaned, "Oh, my belly feels so strange and it\'s starting to hurt."\nHer mother, concerned, said, "Let\'s try to make you feel better, Emily."\nBut nothing they did seemed to help, and her father finally announced, "We need to take you to the hospital, Emily."\nAt the hospital, the doctor explained, "You\'ve eaten too much spicy food, Emily. You need to rest in bed for a few days to get better."\nLying in the hospital bed, Emily whispered sadly, "I never want to eat spicy food again."', ' Emily woke up to her mother\'s cheerful voice calling out to her.
